A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Never in any recess of my mind did I think this movie could possibly be worse than the garbage heap that was the TFA\, with all the amazing directions they couldve went with this movie I was actually very hopeful Rian would actually pull off creating the best Star Wars film of all time.   But instead they failed and underdelivered in virtually every aspect of storytelling imaginable. I no longer have any faith in Disney in regards to this franchise\, in my book.... there are only 6 STAR WARS films. #BringBackLucas
